org.bukkit.event.block

类 BlockDropItemEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bukkit.event.Event
      • org.bukkit.event.block.BlockEvent
        • org.bukkit.event.block.BlockDropItemEvent
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Cancellable
    已过时。 
    draft API

    @Deprecated
public class BlockDropItemEvent
extends BlockEvent
implements Cancellable
    Called if a block broken by a player drops an item. If the block break is cancelled, this event won't be called. If isDropItems in BlockBreakEvent is set to false, this event won't be called. This event will also be called if the player breaks a multi block structure, for example a torch on top of a stone. Both items will have an event call. The Block is already broken as this event is called, so #getBlock() will be AIR in most cases. Use #getBlockData() for more Information about the broken block. Note this event may not currently fire for some drops associated with tile entities

      • isCancelled

        public boolean isCancelled()
        已过时。 
        从接口复制的说明: Cancellable
        获取这个事件是否被取消.一个被取消的事件不会在服务器里被执行，但是仍然会传递事件到其他插件。

        原文：Gets the cancellation state of this event. A cancelled event will not be executed in the server, but will still pass to other plugins

        指定者:
        isCancelled 在接口中 Cancellable
        返回:
        如果事件已经被取消，则为true

      • setCancelled

        public void setCancelled(boolean cancel)
        已过时。 
        从接口复制的说明: Cancellable
        取消这个事件. 一个被取消的事件不会在 服务器里被执行，但是仍然会传递事件到其他插件。

        原文：Sets the cancellation state of this event. A cancelled event will not be executed in the server, but will still pass to other plugins.

        指定者:
        setCancelled 在接口中 Cancellable
        参数:
        cancel - 如果你想取消这个事件，则为true
